Active Record Modeling Life

Jan 18, 2008
Code and Life intertwined ... ewwwwww

A quick observation I made about how ActiveRecord can be used to model life.

class Life < ActiveRecord::Base
  has_many :causes
  has_many :effects, :through => :causes
end
